title: Unfair punishmemt
body: Has anyone else hear I'm the league community been suspended or banned due to in-game chat started by a toxic troller yet YOU ARE THE ONE PUNISHED?

replies.body: Regardless of who initiated the conversation, if toxic things were said an appropriate punishment would likely be given. Chat works a little differently than in person where you always have the option of simply not responding. One good method I've noticed some players using is typing everything they'd like to say, then deleting it and muting the other person. At the end of the match, it's best to have not said anything and report the other person.

i just recieved a 14 day suspension as a first punishment... im level 9... never been in trouble or had any prior reports... was being ganged on by 3 teammates with racist remarks in pregame and heavy agression in the game, also they kept trying to make me seem like the bad guy in game chat... explain this riot... i have my chat log for the "1" game it gave me... did i reply back to them after they were agressive? yup, was i hateful no. a few lines i said might of sounded rude but not grounds for any reports... let alone a 14 day suspension
